plot: Guerrera, a Tijuana drug lord, lackey to her Gringo boss, and does whatever it takes to become his business partner and reach the dream California lifestyle sold by the media.
title: Damned Tijuana
plot_es: Guerrera, a Tijuana drug lord, lackey to her Gringo boss, and does whatever it takes to become his business partner and reach the dream California lifestyle sold by the media.
plot_en: Guerrera, a Tijuana drug lord, lackey to her Gringo boss, and does whatever it takes to become his business partner and reach the dream California lifestyle sold by the media.
